title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Open-World-Based Computer Science Education for Teacher Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Concepts of Computer Science and General Knowledge of Educational Environments
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can develop computational thinking-based lesson design competencies through autonomous problem-solving in open-world simulation environments.
Learners can form knowledge-sharing networks with peers using VR-based collaboration tools and analyze teacher-learner interaction patterns.
Learners can create computer science education modules applicable to real classrooms through gamified project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
